price: Nígbà náà, Àwa ìbá jẹ́ kí o tọ́ ìlọ́po (ìyà) ìṣẹ̀mí ayé àti ìlọ́po (ìyà lẹ́yìn) ikú wò. Lẹ́yìn náà, ìwọ kò níí rí olùrànlọ́wọ́ kan tí ó máa gbà ọ́ sílẹ̀ níbi ìyà Wa.
arabic: إِذٗا لَّأَذَقۡنَٰكَ ضِعۡفَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ وَضِعۡفَ ٱلۡمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: idhan la-adhaqnāka ḍiʿ'fa al-ḥayati waḍiʿ'fa al-mamāti thumma lā tajidu laka ʿalaynā naṣīran
